permissions.description:
Allows player to vanish. 
REALLY should give players with this access to vanish.see
permissions.name: vanish.vanish

permissions.description: Can set state to vanished
permissions.name: vanish.vanish.on

permissions.description: Can set state to unvanished from vanished
permissions.name: vanish.vanish.off

permissions.description: Allows player to see vanished players
permissions.name: vanish.see

permissions.description: Informed about players changing status
permissions.name: vanish.statusupdates

permissions.description: Acquire a list of vanished users
permissions.name: vanish.list

permissions.description: If true player can pick up items when vanished
permissions.name: vanish.nopickup

permissions.description: If true mobs do not follow player when vanished
permissions.name: vanish.nofollow

permissions.description: If true player does not trample crops
permissions.name: vanish.notrample

permissions.description: If true player cannot press buttons, break or place blocks, open doors, activate pressure pads etc
permissions.name: vanish.nointeract

permissions.description: No chatting while vanished
permissions.name: vanish.nochat

permissions.description: Nom nom nom. If true, doesn't lose food level when vanished
permissions.name: vanish.nohunger

permissions.description: Prevent being harmed by things around you while vanished
permissions.name: vanish.preventincomingdamage

permissions.description: Prevent accidentally hurting stuff while vanished
permissions.name: vanish.preventoutgoingdamage

permissions.description: Prevent damage both ways
permissions.name: vanish.preventdamage

permissions.description: Join without announcing it
permissions.name: vanish.joinwithoutannounce

permissions.description: Join vanished
permissions.name: vanish.joinvanished

permissions.description: Join silently. Announce on toggling vanish off
permissions.name: vanish.silentjoin

permissions.description: ALWAYS quit silently.
permissions.name: vanish.silentquit

permissions.description: Allows user to read chests silently while vanished
permissions.name: vanish.silentchests

permissions.description: Toggle ability to read chests silently
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.silentchests

permissions.description: Toggle seeing other vanished players
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.see

permissions.description: Toggle pickup ability
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.nopickup

permissions.description: Toggle mob aggro
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.nofollow

permissions.description: Toggle interaction ability (doors, pressurepads, buttons, breaking or placing blocks, etc)
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.nointeract

permissions.description: Toggle ability to chat
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.nochat

permissions.description: Toggle ability to not lose hunger
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.nohunger

permissions.description: Toggle outgoing damage
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.damageout

permissions.description: Toggle incoming damage
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.damagein

permissions.description: Toggle both damage in and out
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.damage

permissions.description: Allows user to toggle all their settings ingame
permissions.name: vanish.toggle.all

permissions.description: Fake joining/leaving
permissions.name: vanish.fakeannounce

permissions.description: Receive alerts about updates and such
permissions.name: vanish.adminalerts

permissions.description: If PermTest is enabled, be able to use it on yourself
permissions.name: vanish.permtest.self

permissions.description: If PermTest is enabled, be able to use it on others
permissions.name: vanish.permtest.other

permissions.description: If PermTest is enabled, be able to use on self and others
permissions.name: vanish.permtest.all

permissions.description: Always hide from dynmap
permissions.name: vanish.hooks.dynmap.alwayshidden

permissions.description: Hide user in Essentials
permissions.name: vanish.hooks.essentials.hide

permissions.description: See a status bar if vanished in spoutcraft
permissions.name: vanish.spout.status

permissions.description: Reloads some VNP systems
permissions.name: vanish.reload

permissions.description: Creates smoke effect when vanishing and re-appearing
permissions.name: vanish.effects.smoke

permissions.description: Creates explosion effect when vanishing and re-appearing
permissions.name: vanish.effects.explode

permissions.description: Creates a lightning barrage around a player when vanishing and re-appearing
permissions.name: vanish.effects.lightning

permissions.description: Creates a mob spawner flames effect around a player when vanishing and re-appearing
permissions.name: vanish.effects.flames

permissions.description: Creates a swarm of bats around a player when vanishing and re-appearing
permissions.name: vanish.effects.bats

permissions.description: Toggle smoke on vanish toggle
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.smoke

permissions.description: Toggle explode on vanish toggle
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.explode

permissions.description: Toggle lightning on vanish toggle
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.lightning

permissions.description: Toggle flames on vanish toggle
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.flames

permissions.description: Toggle bats on vanish toggle
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.bats

permissions.description: Toggle all vanish toggle effects
permissions.name: vanish.effects.toggle.all

permissions.description: The permission nodes given to ops
permissions.name: vanish.op

permissions.description: Can vanish, see vanished, no pickup when vanished
permissions.name: vanish.standard

permissions.description: Oh god everything.
permissions.name: vanish.*
